h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)
content: One you reach a Clay Vajra, you'll be infused with even more power, and your standard slashes will now cast small projectiles blades out in front of you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)' and the sub-subsection 'Floating Sculpture'.
The content is as follows:
One you reach a Clay Vajra, you'll be infused with even more power, and your standard slashes will now cast small projectiles blades out in front of you.
